name: INTERNATIONAL COMMISSION FOR HUMAN DEVELOPMENT SCIENTISTS - ICSHD
goal:
INTERNATIONAL COMMISSION FOR HUMAN DEVELOPMENT SCIENTISTS - ICSHD
An international non-governmental organization
It shall be a not for profit, educational, training , medical , social, cultural , human development organization pursuant to law
The Mission Statement of ICSHD A educational, training , medical , social, cultural , human development organization to Serve all
The principal goal of ICSHD is to be a educational , training , medical , social, cultural , human development organization serving all All States. Towards this end we intent to provide :
a) Support, awareness and assistance programs for people with special needs
b) Various educational, training , medical , social, cultural , voluntary , human development activities and programs
c) Youth mentoring programs
d) Women mentoring programs
e) Children mentoring programs
